1323210.name: Coloring Pixels - Fairy Tales Pack
1323210.description:
Fairy Tales Book

This Fairy Tales themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by the characters and scenery associated with classic fairy tales, expect levels depicting villainous pirates, mystical genies, and more rare and magical creatures.

Contents

The Fairy Tales book unlocks the following images:
  • Story Book - 37x27
  • Princess - 39x87
  • Elf - 41x92
  • Fairy - 59x56
  • Kraken - 59x59
  • Genie - 59x100
  • Mermaid - 65x100
  • Dwarf - 71x85
  • Ninja - 76x94
  • Pirate - 78x94
  • Centaur - 82x100
  • Unicorn - 84x95
  • Witch - 84x100
  • Pegasus - 85x99
  • Dragon - 88x87
  • Hydra - 96x98
  • Knight - 97x100
  • Phoenix - 98x78
  • Ogre - 100x99
  • Castle - 156x156
